reviews.text: I stayed here for 10 nights and I absolutely loved it! Great location a quick walk to the beach and a little longer walk to Point Lookout. Life on Straddie is relaxed and this is the perfect place to stay!! Friendly staff help you out with whatever you need. Highly recommend!
reviews.title: Learned to surf here!! Great place

reviews.text: This place is old and in serious need of renovation. There is no air flow in the rooms and it is hot at nights. Then on top of that the morning scuba briefing and gear preparation occurs outside your window, not ideal if your not diving. The location is OK, close to the beach, but quite a hike from the Point. Seriously consider other options.
reviews.title: Noisy, hot and run-down

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We've been diving with the Manta Lodge twice now, once for thier annual Shark fest. We choose not to stay at the Lodge because it is a youth hostel and we're not...youth, nor are we hostile towards youth, we just like to sleep.
reviews.title: Love the Lodge but haven't stayed overnight

reviews.text: The staff is friendly and very good at providing excellent dives. James or Joshua are the one's I prefer to dive with as they keep good track of thier divers and made me feel secure. We had not dove/dived? in two years so took the refresher course with Joshua instructing us. On our first dive we were not disappointed in the number of gray nurse sharks we saw. Amazing, close enough to touch, just cruising by.
reviews.title: Overnight at Straddie

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The lodge is right on the beach so they pull the inflatable to the shore with a tractor, we rode a few minutes and then dove in clear water. When the dive is over we ride back to shore, they back the tractor up, we jump out and help steady the inflatalbe, they pull the inflatable out and we walk back to the lodge where everyone, divers and staff helps empty the boat and clean the gear, this is not resort diving, but it is fun.
reviews.title: best place to chill out

reviews.text: This is an ideal place for back packers and those looking for a relaxing island holiday.
reviews.title: Right on the beach, relaxing, company, diving, surfing, fishing
